name: Stephen J. Hemsley
title: Executive Chairman
description: A diversified health company. UnitedHealth offers products and services through two platforms. UnitedHealthcare provides health care coverage and benefits services; and Optum provides information and technology enabled health services.

name: Randall J. Hogan
title: former Ch, CEO
description: Offers sustainable water solutions to the global market; the company split in May, with the electrical unit under the new entity nVent.
footnotes: Hogan's bonus represents a one-time cash payment following his retirement in lieu of the long-term incentive compensation award. Hogan retired on March 14, 2018 but he has 40 hour per year consulting agreement with the company through 2020 during which time he'll be furnished with office space and admin support and services.

name: Inge G. Thulin
title: former Executive Chairman
description: Global diversified technology company with a strong R&D component, it has products in health care, industrial, consumer, electronics and safety areas.
footnotes: Thulin retired as executive chairman of 3M on May 14.

name: John J. Mulligan
title: EVP, COO
description: General merchandise retailer selling everyday essentials, clothing and groceries. It is in the middle of a major upgrade of its physical stores, plus it has introduced more than a dozen new brands and improved its online capabilities and delivery system.

title: EVP, CFO
description: A diversified health company. UnitedHealth offers products and services through two platforms. UnitedHealthcare provides health care coverage and benefits services; and Optum provides information and technology enabled health services.

name: Shari L. Ballard
title: former president multi-channel retail
description: The multinational retailer of technology products and services estimates that 70 percent of the U.S. population is within 15 minutes of its more than 1,500 stores.
footnotes: in fiscal 2019 Ballard stepped down from her role as president, multi-channel retail and remained a company advisor
